    Teaching

    This is a list of some courses I have offered in past.

    less than 1 minute read

    Undergraduate algorithms course

    Blockchain Science and Technology

    less than 1 minute read

    An introductory course in Blockchains for graduate and senior undergraduate students

    Computational Complexity

    less than 1 minute read

    A course on computational complexity theory offered to graduate and senior undergraduate students.

    Computational Number Theory

    less than 1 minute read

    A course of computational number theory offered to graduate and senior undergraduate students.

    Computational Finance

    less than 1 minute read

    An introductory course in computational Finance for graduate and senior undergraduate students

    A course on external memory based algorithms offered to graduate and senior undergraduate students.

    Introduction to Computing

    Optimization Methods

    less than 1 minute read

    A course on linear programs and semi definite programs with applications to various optimization problems which are combinatorial in nature.

    Randomized Algorithms

    less than 1 minute read

    A course on how randomness and computation interact. (Video)

    Theoretical Foundations of CS

    1 minute read

    This course was offered to undergraduates who were enrolled for a minor degree in CS.
